snippet: State Senator Chris McDaniel asked a Mississippi court on Thursday to declare him the winner of the June 24 Republican runoff against the incumbent, United States Senator Thad Cochran, or order a new election.
abstract: Mississippi State Sen Chris McDaniel asks state court to declare him the winner of June 24 Republican runoff against incumbent United States Sen Thad Cochran, or order a new election.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Chris McDaniel asked a Mississippi court on Thursday to declare him the winner of the June 24 Republican runoff against the incumbent, United States Senator Thad Cochran, or order a new election.

headline.main: Mississippi: Loser in G.O.P. Runoff Asks Court to Void Outcome
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Loser in G.O.P. Runoff Asks Court to Void Outcome
